attributes.action: Legislate- Local Authorities Must provide Children&Youth Clubs at no Cost to them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Authorities flout amenities for a child to play, youth clubs have closed and unless parents can afford to pay,youths roam about worrying older,vulnerable citizens.
Other Organisations attack a man and women whom marry in a Church of God.
Time for family support.
